TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BitmapMetadataBlob extends System.Object

summary.span: Fournit un espace réservé pour les éléments de métadonnées qui ne peuvent pas être convertis de C# en un type de données sous‑jacent qui rend les métadonnées persistantes.

span.span: Provides a placeholder for metadata items that cannot be converted from C# to an underlying data type that persists metadata.

summary.span: L’objet blob est converti en un tableau d’octets afin de conserver le contenu.

span.span: The blob is converted into an array of bytes to preserve the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] prend en charge les schémas de métadonnées d’image suivants : [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], texte ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] données textuelles), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], et [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].

related.span: Réseau Graphics textuelle données portables (texte), spécification

span.span: Portable Network Graphics Textual Data (tEXt) Specification

related.span: Informations de schéma de presse internationale de télécommunications conseil IPTC)

span.span: International Press Telecommunications Council (IPTC) Schema Information

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8[] blob) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Initialise une instance de et convertit les métadonnées qu’elle contient en tableau d’octets pour rendre son contenu persistant.

span.span: Initializes an instance of and converts the metadata it holds into an array of bytes to persist its content.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetBlobValue() cil managed

summary.span: Retourne un tableau d'octets qui représente la valeur d'un .

span.span: Returns an array of bytes that represents the value of a .
